helpContent:
Welcome to your Task Planner!

Here's a quick guide to get the most out of the application.

1. Main Navigation: The Planner

The main view is a weekly planner. Use the < and > buttons to navigate between weeks. Click on a day's number to select it and see the tasks associated with that date. The current day will always have a colored border for easy identification.

2. Creating and Managing Tasks

  • Add Task: Type in the text field and press "Add". The task will be automatically created on the currently selected day.
  • Mark as Complete: Use the checkbox to the left of each task.
  • Set Priority (üè∑Ô∏è): Classify your tasks as "Urgent", "Important", or "Normal". This will add a distinctive colored border for better visual organization.
  • Change Date (üìÖ): Need to move a task to another day? Use this button. The task will disappear from the current view and move to the day you choose in the calendar.
  • Edit (‚úèÔ∏è) and Delete (üóëÔ∏è): Modify a task's text or move it to the recycle bin.

3. Organization and Search

Remember that filters, search, and sorting apply only to the tasks of the day you are currently viewing.

  • Filters: Use the "All", "Priorities", and "Completed" buttons to display only what you need.
  • Search: The search field allows you to find tasks by their name quickly.
  • Sort: The dropdown menu lets you reorder the list by priority, alphabetical order, or status (pending first).

4. Additional Features

  • Recycle Bin (üóëÔ∏è): The icon in the header opens the bin. From there, you can restore individual tasks or empty it. Right-click the icon to see quick options like "Restore All".
  • Settings (‚öôÔ∏è): Change the theme (light/dark), language, and accent color of the application to fit your style.
  • Export and Share (‚Üë): Download your day's task list as a PDF, TXT file, or share it directly with other apps.

privacyContent:
Last updated: August 28, 2025

Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains what personal data we collect and how we use it.

Data We Collect

This application is a tool that works entirely in your browser. To ensure your tasks are saved between sessions, we use the browser's localStorage technology.

  • LocalStorage: All data you enter (tasks, language settings, theme, and color) is stored exclusively on your own device, within your browser's local storage.
  • No Personal Data Collection: We do not collect, transmit, or store any personally identifiable information on our servers. We do not have access to your tasks or any other information you enter.

Use of Cookies and Third-Party Ads

This website uses Google AdSense to display advertisements. Google AdSense may use cookies to serve relevant ads based on your prior visits to this or other websites. You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting the Google Ad Settings page.

Contact

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our contact page.
